subject: jWebUnit
msgSnippet: Hi, Somebody mentioned jWebUnit yesterday. I had a look at it and it looks very easy to use. However it looks more like a smoke testing framework rather than a
messageBody:
Hi,

Somebody mentioned jWebUnit yesterday. I had a look at it and it looks very
easy to use. However it looks more like a smoke testing framework rather than a
unit testing framework. We're thinking about using it with scenario based
tests. I am missing something? If you guys write unit test with jWebUnit,
what's your "unit"? A request? Two requests? A scenario?

Thanks,

- Yagiz Erkan -
http://yagiz.blogspot.com
http://www.erkans.com
